vooga.towerdefense.factories.elementfactories

Class GameElementFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • vooga.towerdefense.factories.elementfactories.GameElementFactory

  • public class GameElementFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory that creates game elements based on preset data from an XML file.
    Author:
    Matthew Roy, Xu Rui, Zhen Gou
